backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, plan updates, access control, and audio file storage with strict admin/user authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a frontend error‑handling improvement to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files across pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions providing neon OKLCH color variables, dark‑mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup with user/admin route guards, loading skeletons, and routes for dashboards, audio library, and Mix & Master.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Admin sidebar UI with navigation links, wordmark branding, and logout handling that clears queries and exits admin session.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper applying a neon grid background and rendering page content above it.
UI card for uploading audio files with validation, progress tracking, and submission to the audio library.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Modal handling user and admin authentication flows using Internet Identity and admin password validation.
frontend/src/components/AuthorizationErr: Reusable component that displays authorization or general errors with optional retry and inline or card layout.
Marketing section rendering a grid of feature cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation bar showing login/logout, admin state, and routing controls based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/MyAudioList.tsx: Displays the user's audio files with playback, Mix & Master navigation, and file deletion workflow.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Renders a pricing grid with four subscription plans and triggers auth on plan selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal for new users to enter their name and creates a default free profile.
frontend/src/components/ToolLauncher.tsx: Shows available music tools and enforces plan-based access, navigating or showing upgrade messages.
Displays upgrade options based on the user's current plan or admin mode and handles plan change requests.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Admin table for viewing users and updating their subscription plans with inline editing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminData.ts: Provides admin queries for user stats, full user lists, and a mutation for updating user plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session state with sessionStorage-backed login/logout and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLibrary.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, add, and delete user audio files using react-query and an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile with react-query while syncing state with the actor's availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportUsage.ts: Tracks export usage via mutation, bypassing backend when an admin session is active and refreshing profile data on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identity state, login flow, and stored sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlan.ts: Updates the user's plan by modifying their profile and recalculating export limits before saving.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including dark mode and reusable UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/audioProcessing.ts: Provides audio processing utilities using Web Audio API and functions to export processed audio as WAV.
frontend/src/lib/planUtils.ts: Utility functions for plan naming and determining the effective plan based on admin session state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that requires an admin session and Internet Identity, fetching stats and user data with auto-refresh.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with a hero section, features, pricing, and auth modal triggers.
frontend/src/pages/MixMasterPage.tsx: Provides an audio mixing/mastering interface with file selection, playback, EQ controls, and export handling.
frontend/src/pages/MyAudioPage.tsx: Displays the user's audio library with upload support, authentication gating, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user dashboard with plan info, tools, and profile/error states.
frontend/src/utils/authzErrors.ts: Parses backend authorization errors and maps them to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, radii, shadows, and plugin usage for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the platform’s goals, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features with versioning.
